name: Crystal Squad (Loading Bar Games)
description:
Crystal Squad is a top-view story-driven twin-stick shooter. Choose one of 4 characters to find the villagers that have been kidnapped. Use a modular weapon that provides varying gameplay depending on the pieces you combine. Play with friends or play alone as you discover the world in Crystal Squad.

Find weapon parts to play with 11,250 different weapon combinations. Change either part of a weapon, including its Element, for a weapon that can spit Fire, Electricity and even Water.

Level up one of 4 playable characters; and upgrade your characters to 6 different sub-classes for a total of 24 character combinations!

Play through 6 chapters of stories and quests while fighting against 13 types of enemies!

We'll be working on Crystal Squad until its completion! Here's our current progress :
